item.title: Players online
item.dc:creator: @Usagi Usagi
item.description:
@Usagi wrote:

[font=courier]You need to exclude variable names from being inside double quotes “” so it would be like c.SendQuest("Players online: " + playerHandler.getPlayerCount());

[font=courier]Make sure you know how to program before you jump into this stuff.[/font]

Read full topic

item.title: Players online
item.dc:creator: @Punkzombie Punkzombie
item.description:
@Punkzombie wrote:

i want inside my quest tab to have it show how many players online and this is the coding

if(c.q3 == 0){ c.sendQuest("@mag@+ PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+", 7334); } if(c.q3 > 0){ c.sendQuest("@mag@+ PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+", 7334); } if(c.q3 == 15){ c.sendQuest("@mag@+ PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+", 7334); }
but it just actually say + PlayerHandler… etc…

i need to know how to make it show how many players are online
i know its a dumb question i just cant figure this out for some reason

Read full topic
